chapter.para: The parameter type broadly defines what a parameter is used for. In an application's base data there may be only two parameter types: parameters used for document validationÂ (such as business rules) and parameters used for System Configuration (customizing applications for your institution).
The Parameter Type document allows you to create new or edit existing parameter types. Code must be developed to support any additional types or changes to existing types.
Only members of the KR-SYS Technical Administrator or suitable application role can create or edit Parameter Type documents and they do not route for approval.

section.title: Document Layout
section.para: The Parameter Type document includes the Edit Parameter Type tab.
